title: Aerolineas font
content: I need to identify the font used in the old company logo of the AEROLINEAS ARGENTINAS ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49661.jpg)
author: ludwig

comments.content:
Look a sanserif to me. custom lettering!   
   
Typical style of logos for such companies in the 60's.

There is a ( free ) font out there, named 'Miele', like the German company, and it may be a nice alternate, as well.. Maybe try a search for 'Miele' and 'Free Font' at Google..   
  
_( \* Personal disclaimer.: I dont know who created and / or designed it, and I am not sure if its based on an existing, commercial typeface.. Just to be aware.. )_

' [Miele](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243/http:/www.font.it/font.asp?text=miele)', at font.it.: [www.font.it/font.asp?text=miele](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243/http:/www.font.it/font.asp?text=miele)   
   
_Note to the Typophile admins / moderators.: If 'Miele' is indeed based on a commercial typeface, please feel free to remove my previous posts and replies.. Thank you.._
Thanks, Yves.. _Well, maybe I should have added a ' ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)' as well.._

Another close approximation could be [Koloss](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=koloss).   
   
There are also a couple of free versions (which I don't believe are rip-offs, just different digitizations) -- one by [Dieter Steffmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/index.htm) and also "Phat Phreddy" by [Nick Curtis](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/curtis/pages/p.htm).

[Paris Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/neufville/paris-nd/bold/testdrive.html?s=Aerolineas+Argentinas&p=36) is not so bold but with similar style too I think.   
   
Take also a look at [Britannic Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/britannic/d-ultra/testdrive.html?s=AEROLINEAS+ARGENTINAS&p=36).

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053243im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49702.jpg)   
   
I am posting a better scan.
